amendment.description: To clarify the effect of a title.

action.text: Proposed amendment SA 4027 withdrawn in Senate.
Amendment SA 4027 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899. (consideration: CR S996-1004, S1040; text: CR S997) To clarify the effect of a title.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4027 proposed by Senator Coburn to Amendment SA 3899.
